ngo shes pa yin no/ /bar du lha bsgom pa'i thabs shes pa ni/ bsgrub thabs sna tshogs
nas gsungs pa dang / gong du bstan pa'i bsam gtan kyi lung sems lon gyis bcos pa'i
thabs bstan pa rnams yin no/ /tha ma las su rung ba'i tshad bstan pa ni/ mtshan ma
med pa'i lha'i tshad ni gong du bstan zin to/ /mtshan ma'i lha'i sku bsgoms pa'i tshad
ni/ lha'i lung bcur bstan pa'ang yod na/ mdo gsum du 'dus te/ lham me/ lhan
ne/ lhang nge ba dang gsum ste/ de la lham me ni ma brdos pa/ lhan ne ni ma g.yos
pa/ lhang nge ni ma bsgribs pa'o/ /de la ma brdos pa ni snang la rang bzhin med pa
ste/ gzugs brnyan nam chu zla lta bu

text_a: yid bltas te sbyang bar bya// dang por gzhan pa ka dag gnyis// spang bar bya ba 'di dag ni// dbang po rang bzhin gyis bsdams shing // 'dod pa bkag pa'i gdung bas kyang // ting nge 'dzin ni ma zin pa// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs nye 'gyur bas// bsam gtan snod du 'gyur ba yin// 'di ni so sor spyod ces bya// de phyir bde ba longs spyod de// so sor spang ba zhes kyang bya// 'dod pa'i g.yeng bar gyur pa spang // so sor spang ba sdom la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bsam gtan 'brel dang yul du bcas// dmigs par bya ba'i yan lag can// bsam gtan gyis ni 'dod pa dang // sdig to mi dge ba yi chos// dben pa dag las de skyed yin// 'di yi phyir na de'i 'og tu// bsam gtan bstan pa rigs pas bshad// bsam gtan yul ni sku gsung thugs// gsang ba gsum la yul du bya// de la sku yi gsang ba ni// lha yi phyag rgya gzugs kyi sku// kha dog dbyibs dang g.yo ba yi// smin ma mig dang so dang mchu// bzhin dang lus dang yan lag gis// pad+ma dbang chen dpal gyi rgya// rang don las rnams grub byed pa'o// de ni sku yi tshul rnams kyi// sgo nas bsam gtan yul du dmigs// de la gsung gi gsang ba ni// sgra dang sgra min rnam bcad pa// nga ro sbas pa rdo rje'i gsung // lha yi thugs la ljags steng du// chos kyi yi ge kha dog dang // dbyibs kyi mtshan mar bsam pa dang // de yang sgra dang sgra don gyis// chos nyid brtag pa brtag cing dpyad// bsam gtan thob pa'i rgyu yin te// sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni// rnal 'byor thob par bya ba yin// sgra yi mtha' la gnas pa ni// bsam gtan thar pa ster bar byed// ngag gi sgra grag byed pa ni// bsam gtan gtso bor bshad pa yis// skabs 'dir g.yeng ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de la thugs kyi gsang ba ni// thugs kar sems dpa' rdo rje bsgom// ye shes sems dpa' bsgom pa ni// de ni thugs kyi mtshan ma la// de yi don ni byang chub sems// chos kyi sku ru gnas pa yis// mtshan ma rnam par bcad pa ni// thugs kyi bdag nyid de yin te// de ltar gsal ba gsum dmigs pa/ bsam gtan bya ba'i yul yin no// gsang ba gsum gyis thams cad bsdus// phyag rgya yongs su dag pa yi// lha rnams don dang rtags tshul bsdus// bsam gtan yan lag rnam pa lnga// rtog dpyod gnyis dang dga' bde gnyis// sems ni rtse gcig pa dang lnga// yan lag tshul gyis dmigs par byed// gsang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid la// ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'i blo// de la rtogs nas skye ba'o// de la spyod par byed pa ni// de nyid la ni blo nyid kyis// yang dang yang du sbyor bya zhing // de yi don dang bcas pa la// zhib tu dpyod pa yang nas yang // spyod par byed cing 'jug pa'o// de la dga' bar bya ba ni// rtog dpyod gnyis kyi bsam gtan las// thob pas gsang ba gsum po yi// 'dra snang rnam par 'byung gyur te// de'i tshe 'dod pas dben gyur pa// sngar ma myong ba'i don nyid ni// myong bas thun mong ma yin pa'i// dga' ba rlabs po cher skye'o// de la bde ba bya ba ni// de dbang sems bsdus thob pa na// lus dang sems kyi bde ba ni// des ni nyams su myong 'gyur ro// de la sems rtse gcig pa ni// de ltar sems kyis bsdus 'gyur las// shes pa dang ni shes bya yang // gnyis su snang bar mi skye ste// rang rig tsam du 'gyur ba'o// bsam gtan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de ltar bsam gtan dag gis ni// sems ni zhi bar bya ba la// shin tu dul bar bya ba'i phyir// dbugs kyang dgag cing gtang bar bya// bslab thabs nad du zung ba dang // mtshan ma sngags dang phyi nang rtags// rnal 'byor pa la snang gyur pas// shin tu bslab par bya ba gces// de la ji ltar bslab pa'i thabs// pho rlung mo rlung ma ning rlung // rnam pa de gsum bslab pa dang // phyir la gtad dang nang du 'jug/ khong du gnas la bslab pa dang // sa rlung chu rlung me rlung dang // rlung gi rlung la bslab pa dang // bslab pa'i go yang du mar snang // ji ltar bslab kyang 'gal ba med// gdul bya'i rnam rtog bsam yas kyang // de snyed 'dul thabs sgo rnams spros// don du mi 'gyur gcig ma gsungs// de nas sems kyi rtog 'dul zhing // dbugs zhi brtan par gyur pa dang // rtogs dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir// gcig tu ma nges rgyu ba'i dbugs// nang du gzugs la bslab par bya// de nas yang ni dbugs zin te// sems kyang shin tu zhi bar 'gyur// brtan pa thob par gyur pas ni// mtshan ma rnam lnga 'byung bar 'gyur// dang po smig rgyu 'dra ba dang // gnyis pa la ni du ba'i tshul// gsum pa srin bu me khyer 'dra// bzhi pa mar me bzhin du 'bar// lnga pa rtags su snang ba ni// sprin med pa yi nam mkha' bzhin// de yi rtags ni phyi nang gnyis// phyi la nyin dang mtshan mor snang // de la phyi rtags bya ba ni// dbugs kyang nang du zin gyur na// phyi rol mdun gyi nam mkha' la// rmi lam du ni 'od snang 'gyur// dang por dbugs ni brtan zin na// mkha' la yun ring brtan bltas te// 'od snang ba yi snga ltas su// du ba'i rnam pa lta bu'am// smig rgyu 'dra ba mthong bar 'gyur// de la brtan par gyur nas ni// srin bu me khyer 'dra ba yi// 'od 'dra ba ni mthong bar 'gyur// de la brtan par gyur nas yang // mar me'i 'od snang mthong bar 'gyur// de nas brtan par gyur nas ni// sprin med pa yi nam mkha' bzhin// thams cad du ni gsal gyur te// de rtags chad du phyin pa'o// 'di ni nyin par dbang du gsungs// mtshan mo'i ltas ni thams cad du// me yi 'od ltar 'bar ba ni// rim gyis rgyas par mthong 'gyur ro// n
text_b:
yid du bltas te spyad
par bya la dngos por zhen pa dang dgag pa gnyis spang bar bya ba 'di ni/ dbang po
rang bzhin gyis bsdams shing / 'dod pa bkag pa'i gdung bas kyang ma zin pa dang
/ rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyang nye bar 'gyur bas/ bsam gtan kyi snod du gyur pa yin
no/ /'di la so sor spyod pa ces kyang bya ste/ de bas longs spyod do/ /so sor spong ba
zhes kyang bya ste/ 'dod pas g.yeng bar 'gyur ba spong ngo / /bsam gtan ni 'dod pa
dang sdig to mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa las skyes pa yin pas/ de'i 'og du bsam gtanbstan par rigs so/ /de yang yan lag rnam pa lnga ste/ 'di ltar rtog dpyod gnyis/ dga'
bde gnyis/ sems rtse gcig pa dang lnga'o/ /bsam gtan gyi yul yang 'di'i skabs su gsang
ba gsum nyid yin te/ gsang ba gsum kyis ni phyag rgya thams cad bsdus so/ /phyag
rgyas ni yongs su dag pa'i lha thams cad kyang don dang rtags kyi tshul kyis bsdus
so/ /de la gsang ba gsum las/ sku'i gsang ba ni/ lha'i gzugs kyi sku kha dog dang
dbyibs dang g.yo ba'i bye brag /'di skad du/ smind ma mig dang so dang
mchu/ /bzhin dang lus dang rkang lag gis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya/ /rang don
las rnams sgrub byed pa'o/ /zhes gsungs pa bzhin/ sku'i tshul thams cad kyi sgo
nas/ bsam gtan kyi yul du dmigs pa'o/ /gsung gi gsang ba ni/ /sgra dang sgra min
rnam dpyad pa/ /bsam gtan phyi ma las/  nga ro sbas pa rdo rje'i gsung / /zhes bya
ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ltar/ lha'i thugs ka dang ljags stengs su chos kyi yi ge kha dog
dang dbyibs kyi mtshan mar bsam pa dang / de yang sgra dang sgra'i don kyi chos
nyid dang bcas par brtag cing dpyad pa ni bsam gtan thob pa'i rgyu yin te/ ji skad
du/ sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni rnal 'byor thob par byed pa yin la/ sgra'i mtha' la
gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni thar pa ster bar byed par gsungs pa dang 'dra'o/ /ngag sgra
grags par brjod pa ni bsam gtan gtsor smos pa'i skabs 'dir g.yeng ba'i rgyur 'gyur
ro/ /thugs kyi gsang ba ni/ thugs kar sems pa'i rdo rje bsgom pa dang / ye shes sems
dpa' lta bu bsgom pa ni thugs kyi mtshan ma/ de'i don byang chub kyi sems dang
chos kyi skur gnas pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par dpyad pa ni thugs kyi bdag nyid de/ de
ltar gsang ba gsum la dmigs pa ni bsam gtan gyi yul lo/ /de la dmigs par byed pa
ni/ yan lag lnga'i tshul gyis dmigs par byed de/ de la rtog pa ni gsang ba gsum gyi
mtshan nyid ji ltar ba bzhin du rtog pa'i blo skye ba'o/ /dpyod pa ni de nyid la blo
yang dang yang du sbyor zhing /  de'i don dang bcas pa la dpyod pa yang dang yang
'jug pa'o/ /dga' ba ni rtog dpyod gnyis kyi bsam gtan thob pas gsang ba gsum gyi 'dra
snang gi rnam pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe 'dod pas dben par gyur pa dang / sngar
ma myong ba'i don nyams su myong bas thun mong ma yin pa'i dga' ba rlabs po che
skye'o/ /bde ba ni de'i dbang gis sems bsdus pa thob pa na lus dang sems kyi tshor ba
bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /sems rtse gcig pa ni de ltar sems shin du bsdus
par gyur pa las/ shes pa dang shes bya gnyis su snang bar mi skye ste/ rang rig pa
tsam du gyur pa'o/ /de ltar bsam gtan kyis sems zhi bar byas pa la/ de shin du dul bar
bya ba'i phyir dbugs dgag cing gtang ba la bslab par bya'o/ /de la ji ltar bslab pa'i
thabs ni sgo mang bas gang ltar bslabs kyang 'gal ba med do/ /de nas sems dul zhing
dbugs zhi nas/ brtan zhing stobs dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir/ dbugs nang du gzung
ba la bslab par bya'o/ /de nas dbugs zin te sems kyang shin du zhi bar gyur nas brtan
pa thob pa na/ mtshan ma rnam pa lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di skad du/ dang po
smigs rgyu 'dra ba dang / /gnyis pa la ni du ba'i tshul/ /gsum pa srin bu me khyer
'dra/ /bzhi pa mar me bzhin du 'bar/ /lnga pa rtag du snang ba ni/ /sprin med pa yi
nam mkha' bzhin/ /zhes gsungs te/ de la rtags 'di yang phyi nang rnam pa gnyiste/ de la phyi'i rtags ni dbugs nang du zin par gyur pa na/ phyi rol du mdun kyi nam
mkha' la mig lam du 'od snang bar 'gyur te/ de yang dang po dbugs brtan par zin nas
nam mkha' la yun ring du brtan par bltas pa na/ 'od snang ba'i snga rtags du ba'i rnam
pa smigs rgyu'i rnam pa 'dra ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de brtan par gyur nas du ba 'dra
ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de brtan par gyur nas srin bu med khyer gyi 'od 'dra ba
mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de brtan par gyur nas mar me'i 'od 'dra ba mthong bar 'gyur
ro/ /de brtan par gyur nas sprin med pa'i nam mkha' bzhin du thams cad gsal bar 'gyur
te/ rtags tshad du phyin to/ /'di ni nyin par gyi dbang du gsungs pa yin te/ mtshan mo
bltas na ni thams cad du me'i 'od 'dra bar rims kyis rgyas par mthong bar 'gyur
ro/ /n

text_a: ung // phra zhing drangs pa chu zla ltar// rdos pa'i sha chung dmigs pa na// lus la mi bde mi 'byung ngongo// dbugs la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni// lus kyi rnam pa la mkhas pas// gcig phur blta dang dngos por blta// bden zhing gtsang mar blta rnams bzlog/ lhag mthong don yang bskyed pa'o// sems la gnas pa thob pas ni// zhig nas las su rung gyur pa// rang bzhin gnas yul lam dang las// dmigs pa'i thabs dang yon tan no// sems la dmigs pa'i rang bzhin ni// snang ba'i khams la dmigs pa dang // rlom sems pa yi khams dang ni// dngos po so sor rnam rig mkhas// sems kyi gnas ni sa chu me rlung mkha'i// khams lnga'i rlung la zhon nas su// khams lnga'i lus la gnas pa'o// sems kyi yul ni rnam rig pa// snang ba'i yul ni chos rnams la// rlom sems yul na sems nyid do// rnam par rig par bya ba'i yul// de ni phyi yi skye mched rnams// sems nyid lam ni dbang po rnams// sems kyi las gnyis 'dzin byed ni// 'dzin pa'i las kyis chos rnams 'dzin// byed pa'i las ni dkar nag gi/ 'du byed thams cad ma lus pa// mngon par 'du ni byed pa'o// sems la dmigs pa'i thabs dag ni// dbugs la dmigs pa la rung nas// de nas dran dang shes bzhin gzung // sems ni ji ltar bskyed nyid dmigs// sems kyi mtshan nyid khong chud 'gyur// sems la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni// bdag tu blta dang rtags par blta/ dngos por blta ba thams cad bzlog/ lhag mthong bskyed par byed pa'o// sems nyid las su rung 'gyur te// de yis zhi gnas thob pa'o// lus sems dmigs pa las rung nas// lha dang dmigs par byed pa ni// rang bzhin gnas yul lam dang bcas// dmigs thabs yon tan rim pa dang // dang por bar tha sgom tshad mod// de la lha yi rang bzhin ni// chos nyid rnam par dag pa dang // rnam par mi rtog ye shes dang // cir yang sa le mkhyen pa yis// ye shes 'gro 'dul gzugs kyi sku// so so'i skad du dam pa'i chos// ston pa'i gsung de chos rnga yin// lha yi gnas ni sems can gyis// lus dang sems la gnas pa nyid// lha yi yul ni chos kyi dbyings// thugs rje'i zhing rnams gnas pa'o// lha yi lam ni gang yin pa// 'gro dang 'ong ba mi mnga' yang // lha yongs bzung ba'i sems can ni// sems can skyabs ni lha yin te// 'brel gnyis sgo nas lam gyur pa// lam gyi chos dang lung gi chos// lha yi lam du gyur pa'o// lha yi las ni 'dzin par byed// 'dzin pa'i las ni yon tan ni// thams cad kun dang ldan pa'o// byed pa'i las ni sems can rnams// thams cad grol bar mdzad pa'o// lha la dmigs par byed pa'i thabs// lus dang sems nyid ltar bsgom pas// de la rnal 'byor rnam gsum gyi// tshul gyis byin gyis brlab tshul lam// de nyid yongs su rtag pa'am// rdzogs tshul gang yang rung bar bsgom// lha yi yon tan rnam gnyis tshogs// dus gcig rdzogs par gyur pa'o// de ltar dmigs pa rnam gsum la// rim gyis bslab cing rim gyis brten// 'di ni phyis pa dang po ru// zhugs pa tsam du dngos su ni// lus nyid sems kyi rnam pa yin// sems kyi rang bzhin lha nyid yin// de bas phyi nang snod bcud kyi// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang gi ngo bo lha nyid shes// dang po lha ngo shes pa yin// bar du lha bsgom thabs shes pa// sgrub thabs sna tshogs gsungs pa dang // bsam gtan lus dang sems don gyis// bcos pa'i thabs rnams bstan pa yin// tha ma las su rung ba'i tshad// mtshan ma med pa'i lha tshad ni// byang chub sems la lha ru bzhag/ mtshan ma lha yi sku bsgom tshad// lha
text_b:
ung / phra zhing dang la chu
zla ltar dngos po'i shas chung bar dmigs na lus la mi bde ba mi 'byung ngo
zhe'o/ /dbugs la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni/ lus kyi rnam pa la mkhas pas gcig pur lta ba
dang / dngos por lta ba dang / bde zhing gtsang bar lta ba rnams ldog ste/ lhag
mthong bskyed do/ /sems gnas pa thob pas zhi gnas las su rung bar 'gyur ro/ /sems la
dmigs pa'ang de bzhin sbyar te/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni snang ba'i khams dang / rlom
sems pa'i khams dang / dngos po so so rnam par rig pa'i khams so/ /sems kyi gnas ni
khams lnga pa'i rlung la zhon nas khams lnga pa'i lus la gnas so/ /sems kyi yul
ni/ snang ba'i yul ni chos thams cad do/ /rlom sems pa'i yul ni sems nyid do/ /rnam
par rig pa'i yul ni phyi'i skye mched rnams so/ /sems kyi lam ni dbang po rnams
so/ /sems kyi las ni gnyis te/ 'dzin pa'i las ni chos thams cad 'dzin par byed do/ /byed
pa'i las ni dkar gnag gi 'du byed thams cad mngon par 'du byed do/ /sems la dmigs
pa'i thabs ni/ gong du dbugs la dmigs pa las su rung bas/ de nas dran pa dang shes
bzhin kyis bzung ste/ sems ji ltar skye ba nyid la dmigs pas sems kyi mtshan nyid
khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /dmigs pa'i yon tan ni/ bdag du lta ba dang / rtag par lta
ba dang / dngos por lta ba thams cad ldog ste/ lhag mthong skyed do/ /sems las su
rung bar 'gyur te zhi gnas 'thob bo/ /de ltar lus dang sems la dmigs pa las su rung
nas/ lha la dmigs par bya ste/ lha la'ang re zhig gi mtshan ma lus sems dang mthun
par bstan te/ de yang 'di ltar lha'i rang bzhin ni/ chos nyid dag pa dang / rnam par mi
rtog pa'i ye shes dang / ci yang sa le mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i
gzugs kyi sku dang / so so'i skad du dam pa'i chos ston pa'i gsung ste/ chos lnga'i
rang bzhin no/ /lha'i gnas ni/ sems can kyi lus dang sems nyid do/ /lha'i yul ni chos
kyi dbyings dang / thugs rje'i zhing rnams so/ /lha'i lam ni 'gro 'ong mi mnga' 'ang
/ lha'i yongs su gzung ba ni sems can/ sems can kyi skyabs ni lha ste/ 'brel pa gnyis
kyi sgo dang lam du gyur pa ni/ lam gyi chos sems can dang lhar 'brel/  dang lung gi
chos lha dang sems can du 'brel/  so/ /lha'i las ni/ 'dzin pa'i las ni yon tan thams caddang ldan pa'o/ /byed pa'i las ni sems can sgrol bar mdzad pa'o/ /lha la dmigs pa'i
thabs ni lus dang sems nyid lhar bsgoms pa ste/ de yang rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum gyi
tshul kyis/ byin kyis rlob pa'i tshul lam/ yongs su brtags pa'am/ rdzogs pa'i tshul
gang yang rung bar bsgom mo/ /yon tan ni/  tshogs rnam pa gnyis dus gcig du
rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar dmigs pa rnam pa gsum la rims kyis bslab cing / rims
kyis bstan par bshad pa 'di ni/ byis pa dang po gzhug pa tsam ste/ dngos su ni lus
nyid sems kyi rnam pa yin la/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni lha yin no/ /de bas na phyi nang
snod bcud kyi chos thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo lha nyid du shes pa ni/ dang po lha
ngo shes pa yin no/ /bar du lha bsgom pa'i thabs shes pa ni/ bsgrub thabs sna tshogs
nas gsungs pa dang / gong du bstan pa'i bsam gtan kyi lung sems lon gyis bcos pa'i
thabs bstan pa rnams yin no/ /tha ma las su rung ba'i tshad bstan pa ni/ mtshan ma
med pa'i lha'i tshad ni gong du bstan zin to/ /mtshan ma'i lha'i sku bsgoms pa'i tshad
ni/ lha

text_a: so sor spang dang bsam gtan dang // dbugs dgag stong dang gzung ba dang // rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin ni// sbyor ba'i yan lag drug ces bya// so sor spong ba sdom la gnas// dngos po gzhan dgag spang bar bya// de yi ming grangs bcas pa ni// so sor spang ba zhes su 'dod// dam tshig sdom la gnas pa ni// ji ltar tshul tsam rnam dag pa// 'dod pa'i g.yeng ba med byed cing // 'gyod pa'i dri ma med pa yis// rtag tu dbang po sdom pa'i phyir// ting 'dzin thob pa'i rgyu yin ltar// so sor spang ba zhes bya 'di// yid dang dbang po bsgoms nas ni// rnam par shes pa skye ba kun// thams cad skyon du byas nas ni// spang bar bya ba'ang ma yin la// dngos por bltas te mtshan ma yi// rjes su 'brang ba'ang ma yin la// spyod yul cir snang thams cad kun// rtag tu rang gi lha nyid du// bdag nyid bltas te sbyang bar bya// dang por gzhan pa ka dag gnyis// spang bar bya ba 'di dag ni// dbang po rang bzhin gyis bsdams shing // 'dod pa bkag pa'i gdung bas kyang // ting nge 'dzin ni ma zin pa// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs nye 'gyur bas// bsam gtan snod du 'gyur ba yin// 'di ni so sor spyod ces bya// de phyir bde ba longs spyod de// so sor spang ba zhes kyang bya// 'dod pa'i g.yeng bar gyur pa spang // so sor spang ba sdom la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bsam gtan 'brel dang yul du bcas// dmigs par bya ba'i yan lag can// bsam gtan gyis ni 'dod pa dang // sdig to mi dge ba yi chos// dben pa dag las de skyed yin// 'di yi phyir na de'i 'og tu// bsam gtan bstan pa rigs pas bshad// bsam gtan yul ni sku gsung thugs// gsang ba gsum la yul du bya// de la sku yi gsang ba ni// lha yi phyag rgya gzugs kyi sku// kha dog dbyibs dang g.yo ba yi// smin ma mig dang so dang mchu// bzhin dang lus dang yan lag gis// pad+ma dbang chen dpal gyi rgya// rang don las rnams grub byed pa'o// de ni sku yi tshul rnams kyi// sgo nas bsam gtan yul du dmigs// de la gsung gi gsang ba ni// sgra dang sgra min rnam bcad pa// nga ro sbas pa rdo rje'i gsung // lha yi thugs la ljags steng du// chos kyi yi ge kha dog dang // dbyibs kyi mtshan mar bsam pa dang // de yang sgra dang sgra don gyis// chos nyid brtag pa brtag cing dpyad// bsam gtan thob pa'i rgyu yin te// sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni// rnal 'byor thob par bya ba yin// sgra yi mtha' la gnas pa ni// bsam gtan thar pa ster bar byed// ngag gi sgra grag byed pa ni// bsam gtan gtso bor bshad pa yis// skabs 'dir g.yeng ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de la thugs kyi gsang ba ni// thugs kar sems dpa' rdo rje bsgom// ye shes sems dpa' bsgom pa ni// de ni thugs kyi mtshan ma la// de yi don ni byang chub sems// chos kyi sku ru gnas pa yis// mtshan ma rnam par bcad pa ni// thugs kyi bdag nyid de yin te// de ltar gsal ba gsum dmigs pa/ bsam gtan bya ba'i yul yin no// gsang ba gsum gyis thams cad bsdus// phyag rgya yongs su dag pa yi// lha rnams don dang rtags tshul bsdus// bsam gtan yan lag rnam pa lnga// rtog dpyod gnyis dang dga' bde gnyis// sems ni rtse gcig pa dang lnga// yan lag tshul gyis dmigs par byed// gsang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid la// ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'i blo// de la rtogs nas skye ba'o// de la spyod par byed pa ni// de nyid la ni blo nyid kyis// yang dang yang du sbyor bya zhing // de yi don dang bcas pa la// zhib tu dpyod pa yang nas yang // spyod par byed cing 'jug pa'o// de la dga' bar bya ba ni// rtog dpyod gnyis kyi bsam gtan las// thob pas gsang ba gsum po yi// 'dra snang rnam par 'byung gyur te// de'i tshe 'dod pas dben gyur pa// sngar ma myong ba'i don nyid ni// myong bas thun mong ma yin pa'i// dga' ba rlabs po cher skye'o// de la bde ba bya ba ni// de dbang sems bsdus thob pa na// lus dang sems kyi bde ba ni// des ni nyams su myong 'gyur ro// de la sems rtse gcig pa ni// de ltar sems kyis bsdus 'gyur las// shes pa dang ni shes bya yang // gnyis su snang bar mi skye ste// rang rig tsam du 'gyur ba'o// bsam gtan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de ltar bsam gtan dag gis ni// sems ni zhi bar bya ba la// shin tu dul bar bya ba'i phyir// dbugs kyang dgag cing gtang bar bya// bslab
text_b:
so sor spong dang bsam gtan dang
/ /dbugs dgag gtong dang gzung ba dang / /rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin ni/ /sbyor ba'i
yan lag drug ces bya/ /zhes gsungs pa ste/ de la nang sems kyi rnal 'byor 'thob pa'i
yan lag 'di drug yin te/ de la so sor spong ba ni sdom pa la gnas pa yin te/ ji ltar tshul
khrims rnam par dag pa 'dod pas g.yeng ba med cing 'gyod pa'i dri ma med pas rtag du
dbang po bsdams pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa'i rgyu yin pa de bzhin du/ so sor
spong ba zhes bya ba 'di yang yul dang dbang po'i sgo nas rnam par shes pa skye ba
thams cad skyod du bltas te spang bar bya ba'ang ma yin/ dngos por bltas te mtshan
ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'ang ma yin te/ rtag du rang gi lha'i bdag nyid du bltas te spyad
par bya la dngos por zhen pa dang dgag pa gnyis spang bar bya ba 'di ni/ dbang po
rang bzhin gyis bsdams shing / 'dod pa bkag pa'i gdung bas kyang ma zin pa dang
/ rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyang nye bar 'gyur bas/ bsam gtan kyi snod du gyur pa yin
no/ /'di la so sor spyod pa ces kyang bya ste/ de bas longs spyod do/ /so sor spong ba
zhes kyang bya ste/ 'dod pas g.yeng bar 'gyur ba spong ngo / /bsam gtan ni 'dod pa
dang sdig to mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa las skyes pa yin pas/ de'i 'og du bsam gtanbstan par rigs so/ /de yang yan lag rnam pa lnga ste/ 'di ltar rtog dpyod gnyis/ dga'
bde gnyis/ sems rtse gcig pa dang lnga'o/ /bsam gtan gyi yul yang 'di'i skabs su gsang
ba gsum nyid yin te/ gsang ba gsum kyis ni phyag rgya thams cad bsdus so/ /phyag
rgyas ni yongs su dag pa'i lha thams cad kyang don dang rtags kyi tshul kyis bsdus
so/ /de la gsang ba gsum las/ sku'i gsang ba ni/ lha'i gzugs kyi sku kha dog dang
dbyibs dang g.yo ba'i bye brag /'di skad du/ smind ma mig dang so dang
mchu/ /bzhin dang lus dang rkang lag gis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya/ /rang don
las rnams sgrub byed pa'o/ /zhes gsungs pa bzhin/ sku'i tshul thams cad kyi sgo
nas/ bsam gtan kyi yul du dmigs pa'o/ /gsung gi gsang ba ni/ /sgra dang sgra min
rnam dpyad pa/ /bsam gtan phyi ma las/  nga ro sbas pa rdo rje'i gsung / /zhes bya
ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ltar/ lha'i thugs ka dang ljags stengs su chos kyi yi ge kha dog
dang dbyibs kyi mtshan mar bsam pa dang / de yang sgra dang sgra'i don kyi chos
nyid dang bcas par brtag cing dpyad pa ni bsam gtan thob pa'i rgyu yin te/ ji skad
du/ sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni rnal 'byor thob par byed pa yin la/ sgra'i mtha' la
gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni thar pa ster bar byed par gsungs pa dang 'dra'o/ /ngag sgra
grags par brjod pa ni bsam gtan gtsor smos pa'i skabs 'dir g.yeng ba'i rgyur 'gyur
ro/ /thugs kyi gsang ba ni/ thugs kar sems pa'i rdo rje bsgom pa dang / ye shes sems
dpa' lta bu bsgom pa ni thugs kyi mtshan ma/ de'i don byang chub kyi sems dang
chos kyi skur gnas pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par dpyad pa ni thugs kyi bdag nyid de/ de
ltar gsang ba gsum la dmigs pa ni bsam gtan gyi yul lo/ /de la dmigs par byed pa
ni/ yan lag lnga'i tshul gyis dmigs par byed de/ de la rtog pa ni gsang ba gsum gyi
mtshan nyid ji ltar ba bzhin du rtog pa'i blo skye ba'o/ /dpyod pa ni de nyid la blo
yang dang yang du sbyor zhing /  de'i don dang bcas pa la dpyod pa yang dang yang
'jug pa'o/ /dga' ba ni rtog dpyod gnyis kyi bsam gtan thob pas gsang ba gsum gyi 'dra
snang gi rnam pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe 'dod pas dben par gyur pa dang / sngar
ma myong ba'i don nyams su myong bas thun mong ma yin pa'i dga' ba rlabs po che
skye'o/ /bde ba ni de'i dbang gis sems bsdus pa thob pa na lus dang sems kyi tshor ba
bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /sems rtse gcig pa ni de ltar sems shin du bsdus
par gyur pa las/ shes pa dang shes bya gnyis su snang bar mi skye ste/ rang rig pa
tsam du gyur pa'o/ /de ltar bsam gtan kyis sems zhi bar byas pa la/ de shin du dul bar
bya ba'i phyir dbugs dgag cing gtang ba la bslab

text_a: ung // phra zhing drangs pa chu zla ltar// rdos pa'i sha chung dmigs pa na// lus la mi bde mi 'byung ngongo// dbugs la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni// lus kyi rnam pa la mkhas pas// gcig phur blta dang dngos por blta// bden zhing gtsang mar blta rnams bzlog/ lhag mthong don yang bskyed pa'o// sems la gnas pa thob pas ni// zhig nas las su rung gyur pa// rang bzhin gnas yul lam dang las// dmigs pa'i thabs dang yon tan no// sems la dmigs pa'i rang bzhin ni// snang ba'i khams la dmigs pa dang // rlom sems pa yi khams dang ni// dngos po so sor rnam rig mkhas// sems kyi gnas ni sa chu me rlung mkha'i// khams lnga'i rlung la zhon nas su// khams lnga'i lus la gnas pa'o// sems kyi yul ni rnam rig pa// snang ba'i yul ni chos rnams la// rlom sems yul na sems nyid do// rnam par rig par bya ba'i yul// de ni phyi yi skye mched rnams// sems nyid lam ni dbang po rnams// sems kyi las gnyis 'dzin byed ni// 'dzin pa'i las kyis chos rnams 'dzin// byed pa'i las ni dkar nag gi/ 'du byed thams cad ma lus pa// mngon par 'du ni byed pa'o// sems la dmigs pa'i thabs dag ni// dbugs la dmigs pa la rung nas// de nas dran dang shes bzhin gzung // sems ni ji ltar bskyed nyid dmigs// sems kyi mtshan nyid khong chud 'gyur// sems la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni// bdag tu blta dang rtags par blta/ dngos por blta ba thams cad bzlog/ lhag mthong bskyed par byed pa'o// sems nyid las su rung 'gyur te// de yis zhi gnas thob pa'o// lus sems dmigs pa las rung nas// lha dang dmigs par byed pa ni// rang bzhin gnas yul lam dang bcas// dmigs thabs yon tan rim pa dang // dang por bar tha sgom tshad mod// de la lha yi rang bzhin ni// chos nyid rnam par dag pa dang // rnam par mi rtog ye shes dang // cir yang sa le mkhyen pa yis// ye shes 'gro 'dul gzugs kyi sku// so so'i skad du dam pa'i chos// ston pa'i gsung de chos rnga yin// lha yi gnas ni sems can gyis// lus dang sems la gnas pa nyid// lha yi yul ni chos kyi dbyings// thugs rje'i zhing rnams gnas pa'o// lha yi lam ni gang yin pa// 'gro dang 'ong ba mi mnga' yang // lha yongs bzung ba'i sems can ni// sems can skyabs ni lha yin te// 'brel gnyis sgo nas lam gyur pa// lam gyi chos dang lung gi chos// lha yi lam du gyur pa'o// lha yi las ni 'dzin par byed// 'dzin pa'i las ni yon tan ni// thams cad kun dang ldan pa'o// byed pa'i las ni sems can rnams// thams cad grol bar mdzad pa'o// lha la dmigs par byed pa'i thabs// lus dang sems nyid ltar bsgom pas// de la rnal 'byor rnam gsum gyi// tshul gyis byin gyis brlab tshul lam// de nyid yongs su rtag pa'am// rdzogs tshul gang yang rung bar bsgom// lha yi yon tan rnam gnyis tshogs// dus gcig rdzogs par gyur pa'o// de ltar dmigs pa rnam gsum la// rim gyis bslab cing rim gyis brten// 'di ni phyis pa dang po ru// zhugs pa tsam du dngos su ni// lus nyid sems kyi rnam pa yin// sems kyi rang bzhin lha nyid yin// de bas phyi nang snod bcud kyi// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang gi ngo bo l
text_b:
ung / phra zhing dang la chu
zla ltar dngos po'i shas chung bar dmigs na lus la mi bde ba mi 'byung ngo
zhe'o/ /dbugs la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni/ lus kyi rnam pa la mkhas pas gcig pur lta ba
dang / dngos por lta ba dang / bde zhing gtsang bar lta ba rnams ldog ste/ lhag
mthong bskyed do/ /sems gnas pa thob pas zhi gnas las su rung bar 'gyur ro/ /sems la
dmigs pa'ang de bzhin sbyar te/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni snang ba'i khams dang / rlom
sems pa'i khams dang / dngos po so so rnam par rig pa'i khams so/ /sems kyi gnas ni
khams lnga pa'i rlung la zhon nas khams lnga pa'i lus la gnas so/ /sems kyi yul
ni/ snang ba'i yul ni chos thams cad do/ /rlom sems pa'i yul ni sems nyid do/ /rnam
par rig pa'i yul ni phyi'i skye mched rnams so/ /sems kyi lam ni dbang po rnams
so/ /sems kyi las ni gnyis te/ 'dzin pa'i las ni chos thams cad 'dzin par byed do/ /byed
pa'i las ni dkar gnag gi 'du byed thams cad mngon par 'du byed do/ /sems la dmigs
pa'i thabs ni/ gong du dbugs la dmigs pa las su rung bas/ de nas dran pa dang shes
bzhin kyis bzung ste/ sems ji ltar skye ba nyid la dmigs pas sems kyi mtshan nyid
khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /dmigs pa'i yon tan ni/ bdag du lta ba dang / rtag par lta
ba dang / dngos por lta ba thams cad ldog ste/ lhag mthong skyed do/ /sems las su
rung bar 'gyur te zhi gnas 'thob bo/ /de ltar lus dang sems la dmigs pa las su rung
nas/ lha la dmigs par bya ste/ lha la'ang re zhig gi mtshan ma lus sems dang mthun
par bstan te/ de yang 'di ltar lha'i rang bzhin ni/ chos nyid dag pa dang / rnam par mi
rtog pa'i ye shes dang / ci yang sa le mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i
gzugs kyi sku dang / so so'i skad du dam pa'i chos ston pa'i gsung ste/ chos lnga'i
rang bzhin no/ /lha'i gnas ni/ sems can kyi lus dang sems nyid do/ /lha'i yul ni chos
kyi dbyings dang / thugs rje'i zhing rnams so/ /lha'i lam ni 'gro 'ong mi mnga' 'ang
/ lha'i yongs su gzung ba ni sems can/ sems can kyi skyabs ni lha ste/ 'brel pa gnyis
kyi sgo dang lam du gyur pa ni/ lam gyi chos sems can dang lhar 'brel/  dang lung gi
chos lha dang sems can du 'brel/  so/ /lha'i las ni/ 'dzin pa'i las ni yon tan thams caddang ldan pa'o/ /byed pa'i las ni sems can sgrol bar mdzad pa'o/ /lha la dmigs pa'i
thabs ni lus dang sems nyid lhar bsgoms pa ste/ de yang rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum gyi
tshul kyis/ byin kyis rlob pa'i tshul lam/ yongs su brtags pa'am/ rdzogs pa'i tshul
gang yang rung bar bsgom mo/ /yon tan ni/  tshogs rnam pa gnyis dus gcig du
rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar dmigs pa rnam pa gsum la rims kyis bslab cing / rims
kyis bstan par bshad pa 'di ni/ byis pa dang po gzhug pa tsam ste/ dngos su ni lus
nyid sems kyi rnam pa yin la/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni lha yin no/ /de bas na phyi nang
snod bcud kyi chos thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo l

text_a: so sor spang dang bsam gtan dang // dbugs dgag stong dang gzung ba dang // rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin ni// sbyor ba'i yan lag drug ces bya// so sor spong ba sdom la gnas// dngos po gzhan dgag spang bar bya// de yi ming grangs bcas pa ni// so sor spang ba zhes su 'dod// dam tshig sdom la gnas pa ni// ji ltar tshul tsam rnam dag pa// 'dod pa'i g.yeng ba med byed cing // 'gyod pa'i dri ma med pa yis// rtag tu dbang po sdom pa'i phyir// ting 'dzin thob pa'i rgyu yin ltar// so sor spang ba zhes bya 'di// yid dang dbang po bsgoms nas ni// rnam par shes pa skye ba kun// thams cad skyon du byas nas ni// spang bar bya ba'ang ma yin la// dngos por bltas te mtshan ma yi// rjes su 'brang ba'ang ma yin la// spyod yul cir snang thams cad kun// rtag tu rang gi lha nyid du// bdag nyid bltas te sbyang bar bya// dang por gzhan pa ka dag gnyis// spang bar bya ba 'di dag ni// dbang po rang bzhin gyis bsdams shing // 'dod pa bkag pa'i gdung bas kyang // ting nge 'dzin ni ma zin pa// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs nye 'gyur bas// bsam gtan snod du 'gyur ba yin// 'di ni so sor spyod ces bya// de phyir bde ba longs spyod de// so sor spang ba zhes kyang bya// 'dod pa'i g.yeng bar gyur pa spang // so sor spang ba sdom la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bsam gtan 'brel dang yul du bcas// dmigs par bya ba'i yan lag can// bsam gtan gyis ni 'dod pa dang // sdig to mi dge ba yi chos// dben pa dag las de skyed yin// 'di yi phyir na de'i 'og tu// bsam gtan bstan pa rigs pas bshad// bsam gtan yul ni sku gsung thugs// gsang ba gsum la yul du bya// de la sku yi gsang ba ni// lha yi phyag rgya gzugs kyi sku// kha dog dbyibs dang g.yo ba yi// smin ma mig dang so dang mchu// bzhin dang lus dang yan lag gis// pad+ma dbang chen dpal gyi rgya// rang don las rnams grub byed pa'o// de ni sku yi tshul rnams kyi// sgo nas bsam gtan yul du dmigs// de la gsung gi gsang ba ni// sgra dang sgra min rnam bcad pa// nga ro sbas pa rdo rje'i gsung // lha yi thugs la ljags steng du// chos kyi yi ge kha dog dang // dbyibs kyi mtshan mar bsam pa dang // de yang sgra dang sgra don gyis// chos nyid brtag pa brtag cing dpyad// bsam gtan thob pa'i rgyu yin te// sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni// rnal 'byor thob par bya ba yin// sgra yi mtha' la gnas pa ni// bsam gtan thar pa ster bar byed// ngag gi sgra grag byed pa ni// bsam gtan gtso bor bshad pa yis// skabs 'dir g.yeng ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de la thugs kyi gsang ba ni// thugs kar sems dpa' rdo rje bsgom// ye shes sems dpa' bsgom pa ni// de ni thugs kyi mtshan ma la// de yi don ni byang chub sems// chos kyi sku ru gnas pa yis// mtshan ma rnam par bcad pa ni// thugs kyi bdag nyid de yin te// de ltar gsal ba gsum dmigs pa/ bsam gtan bya ba'i yul yin no// gsang ba gsum gyis thams cad bsdus// phyag rgya yongs su dag pa yi// lha rnams don dang rtags tshul bsdus// bsam gtan yan lag rnam pa lnga// rtog dpyod gnyis dang dga' bde gnyis// sems ni rtse gcig pa dang lnga// yan lag tshul gyis dmigs par byed// gsang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid la// ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'i blo// de la rtogs nas skye ba'o// de la spyod par byed pa ni// de nyid la ni blo nyid kyis// yang dang yang du sbyor bya zhing // de yi don dang bcas pa la// zhib tu dpyod pa yang nas yang // spyod par byed cing 'jug pa'o// de la dga' bar bya ba ni// rtog dpyod gnyis kyi bsam gtan las// thob pas gsang ba gsum po yi// 'dra snang rnam par 'byung gyur te// de'i tshe 'dod pas dben gyur pa// sngar ma myong ba'i don nyid ni// myong bas thun mong ma yin pa'i// dga' ba rlabs po cher skye'o// de la bde ba bya ba ni// de dbang sems b

text_a: gzugs kyi sku// so so'i skad du dam pa'i chos// ston pa'i gsung de chos rnga yin// lha yi gnas ni sems can gyis// lus dang sems la gnas pa nyid// lha yi yul ni chos kyi dbyings// thugs rje'i zhing rnams gnas pa'o// lha yi lam ni gang yin pa// 'gro dang 'ong ba mi mnga' yang // lha yongs bzung ba'i sems can ni// sems can skyabs ni lha yin te// 'brel gnyis sgo nas lam gyur pa// lam gyi chos dang lung gi chos// lha yi lam du gyur pa'o// lha yi las ni 'dzin par byed// 'dzin pa'i las ni yon tan ni// thams cad kun dang ldan pa'o// byed pa'i las ni sems can rnams// thams cad grol bar mdzad pa'o// lha la dmigs par byed pa'i thabs// lus dang sems nyid ltar bsgom pas// de la rnal 'byor rnam gsum gyi// tshul gyis byin gyis brlab tshul lam// de nyid yongs su rtag pa'am// rdzogs tshul gang yang rung bar bsgom// lha yi yon tan rnam gnyis tshogs// dus gcig rdzogs par gyur pa'o// de ltar dmigs pa rnam gsum la// rim gyis bslab cing rim gyis brten// 'di ni phyis pa dang po ru// zhugs pa tsam du dngos su ni// lus nyid sems kyi rnam pa yin// sems kyi rang bzhin lha nyid yin// de bas phyi nang snod bcud kyi// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang gi ngo bo lha nyid shes// dang po lha ngo shes pa yin// bar du lha bsgom thabs shes pa// sgrub thabs sna tshogs gsungs pa dang // bsam gtan lus dang sems don gyis// bcos pa'i thabs rnams bstan pa yin// tha ma las su rung ba'i tshad// mtshan ma med pa'i lha tshad ni// byang chub sems la lha ru bzhag/ mtshan ma lha yi sku bsgom tshad// lhang nge lhan nineni lham me gsum// lham me ba ni ma rdos pa// lhan ne ba ni ma g.yos pa// lhang nge ba ni ma bsgribs pa// ma rdos snang la rang bzhin med// gzugs brnyan chu zla lta bu'o// ma g.yos pa ni bying rgod kyi// zug rdu ma skyes pa yin te// nor bu rin chen 'od lta bu// ma bsgribs de gnyis dang ldan pas// ma rtogs pa yi sgrib pa dang // mi gsal ba yi sgrib pa gnyis// med par shin tu gsal bar snang // dbang pos blta bar mi bzod ltar// lha sku shin tu gsal ba'o// tshul bzhin byed par ma nus na// bzlas brjod lha yi de kho nas// lhar grags lhun grub sems can khengs// rang la gnas pa de rtogs yin// tshul bzhin slob bar 'dod pa yis// de dag rnams kyis tshul du spyod// gang dag tshul bzhin byed ma nus// mos dang bya bas g.yeng 'gyur zhing // tshul bzhin sbyor bar mi nus rnams// brda' don lha yi ting 'dzin ni// ji ltar yin pa yid la bya// des zin cho ga rim gyis bskyed// skad cig gcig la rdzogs tshul lam// bag chags shugs sam mos pa dang // nga rgyal dag gi sgo nas kyang // ma yengs pa yi sems kyis gzung // bzlas brjod bya zhing bsam gtan 'jug/ bzlas brjod byed pa'i tshe na yang // lha ni mi bsam ma dmigs rung // las sam 'bras bu gang dmigs kyang // spyir na dmigs pa rtse gcig la// 'bad pas mthu dang byin rlabs che// spyir na lha yi de kho na// nyid las 'grub pa'i lha yang 'grub// don dam sems kyi lha dang ni// kun rdzob mtshan ma'i lha nyid la// sems dpa' bye brag lha zhes bya// ming du lhar ni btags pa yin// dam tshig can gyi skye bo'i lha// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma lhar grags pa// btags pas rnam pa du mar 'jug/ rnam par
text_b:
gzugs kyi sku dang / so so'i skad du dam pa'i chos ston pa'i gsung ste/ chos lnga'i
rang bzhin no/ /lha'i gnas ni/ sems can kyi lus dang sems nyid do/ /lha'i yul ni chos
kyi dbyings dang / thugs rje'i zhing rnams so/ /lha'i lam ni 'gro 'ong mi mnga' 'ang
/ lha'i yongs su gzung ba ni sems can/ sems can kyi skyabs ni lha ste/ 'brel pa gnyis
kyi sgo dang lam du gyur pa ni/ lam gyi chos sems can dang lhar 'brel/  dang lung gi
chos lha dang sems can du 'brel/  so/ /lha'i las ni/ 'dzin pa'i las ni yon tan thams caddang ldan pa'o/ /byed pa'i las ni sems can sgrol bar mdzad pa'o/ /lha la dmigs pa'i
thabs ni lus dang sems nyid lhar bsgoms pa ste/ de yang rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum gyi
tshul kyis/ byin kyis rlob pa'i tshul lam/ yongs su brtags pa'am/ rdzogs pa'i tshul
gang yang rung bar bsgom mo/ /yon tan ni/  tshogs rnam pa gnyis dus gcig du
rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar dmigs pa rnam pa gsum la rims kyis bslab cing / rims
kyis bstan par bshad pa 'di ni/ byis pa dang po gzhug pa tsam ste/ dngos su ni lus
nyid sems kyi rnam pa yin la/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni lha yin no/ /de bas na phyi nang
snod bcud kyi chos thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo lha nyid du shes pa ni/ dang po lha
ngo shes pa yin no/ /bar du lha bsgom pa'i thabs shes pa ni/ bsgrub thabs sna tshogs
nas gsungs pa dang / gong du bstan pa'i bsam gtan kyi lung sems lon gyis bcos pa'i
thabs bstan pa rnams yin no/ /tha ma las su rung ba'i tshad bstan pa ni/ mtshan ma
med pa'i lha'i tshad ni gong du bstan zin to/ /mtshan ma'i lha'i sku bsgoms pa'i tshad
ni/ lha'i lung bcur bstan pa'ang yod na/ mdo gsum du 'dus te/ lham me/ lhan
ne/ lhang nge ba dang gsum ste/ de la lham me ni ma brdos pa/ lhan ne ni ma g.yos
pa/ lhang nge ni ma bsgribs pa'o/ /de la ma brdos pa ni snang la rang bzhin med pa
ste/ gzugs brnyan nam chu zla lta bu'o/ /ma g.yos pa ni bying rgod kyi zug rngus ma
bskyod pa ste/ nor bu rin po che'i 'od lta bu'o/ /ma bsgribs pa ni de gnyis dang ldan
pas ma rtogs pa'i sgrib pa dang / mi gsal ba'i sgrib pa gnyis med par shin du gsal bar
snang ba/ dbang pos blta bar mi bzod pa ltar shin tu gsal ba'o/ /de dag ni tshul bzhin
du slob par 'dod pa rnams kyi dbang du bshad pa'o/ /gang dag mos pa dang bya bas
g.yengs par gyur cing tshul bzhin du sbyor mi nus pa rnams kyis ni/ rdzogs pa chen
po'i don dang / lha'i rang bzhin ji ltar ba yid la bya ste/ des zin par byas la/ cho ga'i
rim pas bskyed kyang rung / skad cig gcig la rdzogs pa'i tshul lam/ bag chags kyi
shugs sam/ mos pa dang nga rgyal kyi sgo nas kyang ma yengs pa'i sems kyis bzung
ste/ bzlas brjod dang bsam gtan la 'jug go /bzlas brjod kyi tshe'ang mdun du lha
dmigs kyang rung / ma dmigs kyang rung / 'phro 'du yod kyang rung med kyang
rung / las sam 'bras bu gang la dmigs kyang rung ste/ spyir dmigs pa rtse gcig pas
'bad pa ltar mthu dang byin rlabs che'o/ /spyir lha'i de kho na nyid la/ lha drug du
grags pa dang / don dam pa'i lha chos nyid kyi lha/ dang / sems pa'i bye brag gi lha
gzhan kun/  zhes bya ba dang / lhar btags pa dang / dam tshig can gyi skye bos
brtags pa'i lha zhes spyir grags mod kyi/ phyag rgya'i mtshan ma la lhar grags pa
na/ brtag pa rnam pa du ma la 'jug ste/ rnam par

text_a: s bzhin gzung // sems ni ji ltar bskyed nyid dmigs// sems kyi mtshan nyid khong chud 'gyur// sems la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni// bdag tu blta dang rtags par blta/ dngos por blta ba thams cad bzlog/ lhag mthong bskyed par byed pa'o// sems nyid las su rung 'gyur te// de yis zhi gnas thob pa'o// lus sems dmigs pa las rung nas// lha dang dmigs par byed pa ni// rang bzhin gnas yul lam dang bcas// dmigs thabs yon tan rim pa dang // dang por bar tha sgom tshad mod// de la lha yi rang bzhin ni// chos nyid rnam par dag pa dang // rnam par mi rtog ye shes dang // cir yang sa le mkhyen pa yis// ye shes 'gro 'dul gzugs kyi sku// so so'i skad du dam pa'i chos// ston pa'i gsung de chos rnga yin// lha yi gnas ni sems can gyis// lus dang sems la gnas pa nyid// lha yi yul ni chos kyi dbyings// thugs rje'i zhing rnams gnas pa'o// lha yi lam ni gang yin pa// 'gro dang 'ong ba mi mnga' yang // lha yongs bzung ba'i sems can ni// sems can skyabs ni lha yin te// 'brel gnyis sgo nas lam gyur pa// lam gyi chos dang lung gi chos// lha yi lam du gyur pa'o// lha yi las ni 'dzin par byed// 'dzin pa'i las ni yon tan ni// thams cad kun dang ldan pa'o// byed pa'i las ni sems can rnams// thams cad grol bar mdzad pa'o// lha la dmigs par byed pa'i thabs// lus dang sems nyid ltar bsgom pas// de la rnal 'byor rnam gsum gyi// tshul gyis byin gyis brlab tshul lam// de nyid yongs su rtag pa'am// rdzogs tshul gang yang rung bar bsgom// lha yi yon tan rnam gnyis tshogs// dus gcig rdzogs par gyur pa'o// de ltar dmigs pa rnam gsum la// rim gyis bslab cing rim gyis brten// 'di ni phyis pa dang po ru// zhugs pa tsam du dngos su ni// lus nyid sems kyi rnam pa yin// sems kyi rang bzhin lha nyid yin// de bas phyi nang snod bcud kyi// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang gi ngo bo lha nyid shes// dang po lha ngo shes pa yin// bar du lha bsgom thabs shes pa// sgrub thabs sna tshogs gsungs pa dang // bsam gtan lus dang sems don gyis// bcos pa'i thabs rnams bstan pa yin// tha ma las su rung ba'i tshad// mtshan ma med pa'i lha tshad ni// byang chub sems la lha ru bzhag/ mtshan ma lha yi sku bsgom tshad// lhang nge lhan nineni lham me gsum// lham me ba ni ma rdos pa// lhan ne ba ni ma g.yos pa// lhang nge ba ni ma bsgribs pa// ma rdos snang la rang bzhin med// gzugs brnyan chu zla lta bu'o// ma g.yos pa ni bying rgod kyi// zug rdu ma skyes pa yin te// nor bu rin chen 'od lta bu// ma bsgribs de gnyis dang ldan pas// ma rtogs pa yi sgrib pa dang // mi gsal ba yi sgrib pa gnyis// med par shin tu gsal bar snang // dbang pos blta bar mi bzod ltar// lha sku shin tu gsal ba'o// tshul bzhin
text_b:
s
bzhin kyis bzung ste/ sems ji ltar skye ba nyid la dmigs pas sems kyi mtshan nyid
khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /dmigs pa'i yon tan ni/ bdag du lta ba dang / rtag par lta
ba dang / dngos por lta ba thams cad ldog ste/ lhag mthong skyed do/ /sems las su
rung bar 'gyur te zhi gnas 'thob bo/ /de ltar lus dang sems la dmigs pa las su rung
nas/ lha la dmigs par bya ste/ lha la'ang re zhig gi mtshan ma lus sems dang mthun
par bstan te/ de yang 'di ltar lha'i rang bzhin ni/ chos nyid dag pa dang / rnam par mi
rtog pa'i ye shes dang / ci yang sa le mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i
gzugs kyi sku dang / so so'i skad du dam pa'i chos ston pa'i gsung ste/ chos lnga'i
rang bzhin no/ /lha'i gnas ni/ sems can kyi lus dang sems nyid do/ /lha'i yul ni chos
kyi dbyings dang / thugs rje'i zhing rnams so/ /lha'i lam ni 'gro 'ong mi mnga' 'ang
/ lha'i yongs su gzung ba ni sems can/ sems can kyi skyabs ni lha ste/ 'brel pa gnyis
kyi sgo dang lam du gyur pa ni/ lam gyi chos sems can dang lhar 'brel/  dang lung gi
chos lha dang sems can du 'brel/  so/ /lha'i las ni/ 'dzin pa'i las ni yon tan thams caddang ldan pa'o/ /byed pa'i las ni sems can sgrol bar mdzad pa'o/ /lha la dmigs pa'i
thabs ni lus dang sems nyid lhar bsgoms pa ste/ de yang rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum gyi
tshul kyis/ byin kyis rlob pa'i tshul lam/ yongs su brtags pa'am/ rdzogs pa'i tshul
gang yang rung bar bsgom mo/ /yon tan ni/  tshogs rnam pa gnyis dus gcig du
rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar dmigs pa rnam pa gsum la rims kyis bslab cing / rims
kyis bstan par bshad pa 'di ni/ byis pa dang po gzhug pa tsam ste/ dngos su ni lus
nyid sems kyi rnam pa yin la/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni lha yin no/ /de bas na phyi nang
snod bcud kyi chos thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo lha nyid du shes pa ni/ dang po lha
ngo shes pa yin no/ /bar du lha bsgom pa'i thabs shes pa ni/ bsgrub thabs sna tshogs
nas gsungs pa dang / gong du bstan pa'i bsam gtan kyi lung sems lon gyis bcos pa'i
thabs bstan pa rnams yin no/ /tha ma las su rung ba'i tshad bstan pa ni/ mtshan ma
med pa'i lha'i tshad ni gong du bstan zin to/ /mtshan ma'i lha'i sku bsgoms pa'i tshad
ni/ lha'i lung bcur bstan pa'ang yod na/ mdo gsum du 'dus te/ lham me/ lhan
ne/ lhang nge ba dang gsum ste/ de la lham me ni ma brdos pa/ lhan ne ni ma g.yos
pa/ lhang nge ni ma bsgribs pa'o/ /de la ma brdos pa ni snang la rang bzhin med pa
ste/ gzugs brnyan nam chu zla lta bu'o/ /ma g.yos pa ni bying rgod kyi zug rngus ma
bskyod pa ste/ nor bu rin po che'i 'od lta bu'o/ /ma bsgribs pa ni de gnyis dang ldan
pas ma rtogs pa'i sgrib pa dang / mi gsal ba'i sgrib pa gnyis med par shin du gsal bar
snang ba/ dbang pos blta bar mi bzod pa ltar shin tu gsal ba'o/ /de dag ni tshul bzhin

text_a: s te mtshan ma yi// rjes su 'brang ba'ang ma yin la// spyod yul cir snang thams cad kun// rtag tu rang gi lha nyid du// bdag nyid bltas te sbyang bar bya// dang por gzhan pa ka dag gnyis// spang bar bya ba 'di dag ni// dbang po rang bzhin gyis bsdams shing // 'dod pa bkag pa'i gdung bas kyang // ting nge 'dzin ni ma zin pa// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs nye 'gyur bas// bsam gtan snod du 'gyur ba yin// 'di ni so sor spyod ces bya// de phyir bde ba longs spyod de// so sor spang ba zhes kyang bya// 'dod pa'i g.yeng bar gyur pa spang // so sor spang ba sdom la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bsam gtan 'brel dang yul du bcas// dmigs par bya ba'i yan lag can// bsam gtan gyis ni 'dod pa dang // sdig to mi dge ba yi chos// dben pa dag las de skyed yin// 'di yi phyir na de'i 'og tu// bsam gtan bstan pa rigs pas bshad// bsam gtan yul ni sku gsung thugs// gsang ba gsum la yul du bya// de la sku yi gsang ba ni// lha yi phyag rgya gzugs kyi sku// kha dog dbyibs dang g.yo ba yi// smin ma mig dang so dang mchu// bzhin dang lus dang yan lag gis// pad+ma dbang chen dpal gyi rgya// rang don las rnams grub byed pa'o// de ni sku yi tshul rnams kyi// sgo nas bsam gtan yul du dmigs// de la gsung gi gsang ba ni// sgra dang sgra min rnam bcad pa// nga ro sbas pa rdo rje'i gsung // lha yi thugs la ljags steng du// chos kyi yi ge kha dog dang // dbyibs kyi mtshan mar bsam pa dang // de yang sgra dang sgra don gyis// chos nyid brtag pa brtag cing dpyad// bsam gtan thob pa'i rgyu yin te// sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni// rnal 'byor thob par bya ba yin// sgra yi mtha' la gnas pa ni// bsam gtan thar pa ster bar byed// ngag gi sgra grag byed pa ni// bsam gtan gtso bor bshad pa yis// skabs 'dir g.yeng ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de la thugs kyi gsang ba ni// thugs kar sems dpa' rdo rje bsgom// ye shes sems dpa' bsgom pa ni// de ni thugs kyi mtshan ma la// de yi don ni byang chub sems// chos kyi sku ru gnas pa yis// mtshan ma rnam par bcad pa ni// thugs kyi bdag nyid de yin te// de ltar gsal ba gsum dmigs pa/ bsam gtan bya ba'i yul yin no// gsang ba gsum gyis thams cad bsdus// phyag rgya yongs su dag pa yi// lha rnams don dang rtags tshul bsdus// bsam gtan yan lag rnam pa lnga// rtog dpyod gnyis dang dga' bde gnyis// sems ni rtse gcig pa dang lnga// yan lag tshul gyis dmigs par byed// gsang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid la// ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'i blo// de la rtogs nas skye ba'o// de la spyod par byed pa ni// de nyid la ni blo nyid kyis// yang dang yang du sbyor bya zhing // de yi don dang bcas pa la// zhib tu dpyod pa yang nas yang // spyod par byed cing 'jug pa'o// de la dga' bar bya ba ni// rtog dpyod gnyis kyi bsam gtan las// thob pas gsang ba gsum po yi// 'dra snang rnam par 'byung gyur te// de'i tshe 'dod pas dben gyur pa// sngar ma myong ba'i don nyid ni// myong bas thun mong ma yin pa'i// dga' ba rlabs po cher skye'o// de la bde ba bya ba ni// de dbang sems bsdus thob pa na// lus dang sems kyi bde ba ni// des ni nyams su myong 'gyur ro// de la sems rtse gcig pa ni// de ltar sems kyis bsdus 'gyur las// shes pa dang ni shes bya yang // gnyis su snang bar mi skye ste// rang rig tsam du 'gyur ba'o// bsam gtan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de ltar bsam gtan dag gis ni// sems ni zhi bar bya ba la// shin tu dul bar bya ba'i phyir// dbugs kyang dgag cing gtang bar bya// bslab
text_b:
s te mtshan
ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'ang ma yin te/ rtag du rang gi lha'i bdag nyid du bltas te spyad
par bya la dngos por zhen pa dang dgag pa gnyis spang bar bya ba 'di ni/ dbang po
rang bzhin gyis bsdams shing / 'dod pa bkag pa'i gdung bas kyang ma zin pa dang
/ rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyang nye bar 'gyur bas/ bsam gtan kyi snod du gyur pa yin
no/ /'di la so sor spyod pa ces kyang bya ste/ de bas longs spyod do/ /so sor spong ba
zhes kyang bya ste/ 'dod pas g.yeng bar 'gyur ba spong ngo / /bsam gtan ni 'dod pa
dang sdig to mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa las skyes pa yin pas/ de'i 'og du bsam gtanbstan par rigs so/ /de yang yan lag rnam pa lnga ste/ 'di ltar rtog dpyod gnyis/ dga'
bde gnyis/ sems rtse gcig pa dang lnga'o/ /bsam gtan gyi yul yang 'di'i skabs su gsang
ba gsum nyid yin te/ gsang ba gsum kyis ni phyag rgya thams cad bsdus so/ /phyag
rgyas ni yongs su dag pa'i lha thams cad kyang don dang rtags kyi tshul kyis bsdus
so/ /de la gsang ba gsum las/ sku'i gsang ba ni/ lha'i gzugs kyi sku kha dog dang
dbyibs dang g.yo ba'i bye brag /'di skad du/ smind ma mig dang so dang
mchu/ /bzhin dang lus dang rkang lag gis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya/ /rang don
las rnams sgrub byed pa'o/ /zhes gsungs pa bzhin/ sku'i tshul thams cad kyi sgo
nas/ bsam gtan kyi yul du dmigs pa'o/ /gsung gi gsang ba ni/ /sgra dang sgra min
rnam dpyad pa/ /bsam gtan phyi ma las/  nga ro sbas pa rdo rje'i gsung / /zhes bya
ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ltar/ lha'i thugs ka dang ljags stengs su chos kyi yi ge kha dog
dang dbyibs kyi mtshan mar bsam pa dang / de yang sgra dang sgra'i don kyi chos
nyid dang bcas par brtag cing dpyad pa ni bsam gtan thob pa'i rgyu yin te/ ji skad
du/ sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni rnal 'byor thob par byed pa yin la/ sgra'i mtha' la
gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni thar pa ster bar byed par gsungs pa dang 'dra'o/ /ngag sgra
grags par brjod pa ni bsam gtan gtsor smos pa'i skabs 'dir g.yeng ba'i rgyur 'gyur
ro/ /thugs kyi gsang ba ni/ thugs kar sems pa'i rdo rje bsgom pa dang / ye shes sems
dpa' lta bu bsgom pa ni thugs kyi mtshan ma/ de'i don byang chub kyi sems dang
chos kyi skur gnas pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par dpyad pa ni thugs kyi bdag nyid de/ de
ltar gsang ba gsum la dmigs pa ni bsam gtan gyi yul lo/ /de la dmigs par byed pa
ni/ yan lag lnga'i tshul gyis dmigs par byed de/ de la rtog pa ni gsang ba gsum gyi
mtshan nyid ji ltar ba bzhin du rtog pa'i blo skye ba'o/ /dpyod pa ni de nyid la blo
yang dang yang du sbyor zhing /  de'i don dang bcas pa la dpyod pa yang dang yang
'jug pa'o/ /dga' ba ni rtog dpyod gnyis kyi bsam gtan thob pas gsang ba gsum gyi 'dra
snang gi rnam pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe 'dod pas dben par gyur pa dang / sngar
ma myong ba'i don nyams su myong bas thun mong ma yin pa'i dga' ba rlabs po che
skye'o/ /bde ba ni de'i dbang gis sems bsdus pa thob pa na lus dang sems kyi tshor ba
bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /sems rtse gcig pa ni de ltar sems shin du bsdus
par gyur pa las/ shes pa dang shes bya gnyis su snang bar mi skye ste/ rang rig pa
tsam du gyur pa'o/ /de ltar bsam gtan kyis sems zhi bar byas pa la/ de shin du dul bar
bya ba'i phyir dbugs dgag cing gtang ba la bslab

text_a: rtag tu rang gi lha nyid du// bdag nyid bltas te sbyang bar bya// dang por gzhan pa ka dag gnyis// spang bar bya ba 'di dag ni// dbang po rang bzhin gyis bsdams shing // 'dod pa bkag pa'i gdung bas kyang // ting nge 'dzin ni ma zin pa// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs nye 'gyur bas// bsam gtan snod du 'gyur ba yin// 'di ni so sor spyod ces bya// de phyir bde ba longs spyod de// so sor spang ba zhes kyang bya// 'dod pa'i g.yeng bar gyur pa spang // so sor spang ba sdom la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bsam gtan 'brel dang yul du bcas// dmigs par bya ba'i yan lag can// bsam gtan gyis ni 'dod pa dang // sdig to mi dge ba yi chos// dben pa dag las de skyed yin// 'di yi phyir na de'i 'og tu// bsam gtan bstan pa rigs pas bshad// bsam gtan yul ni sku gsung thugs// gsang ba gsum la yul du bya// de la sku yi gsang ba ni// lha yi phyag rgya gzugs kyi sku// kha dog dbyibs dang g.yo ba yi// smin ma mig dang so dang mchu// bzhin dang lus dang yan lag gis// pad+ma dbang chen dpal gyi rgya// rang don las rnams grub byed pa'o// de ni sku yi tshul rnams kyi// sgo nas bsam gtan yul du dmigs// de la gsung gi gsang ba ni// sgra dang sgra min rnam bcad pa// nga ro sbas pa rdo rje'i gsung // lha yi thugs la ljags steng du// chos kyi yi ge kha dog dang // dbyibs kyi mtshan mar bsam pa dang // de yang sgra dang sgra don gyis// chos nyid brtag pa brtag cing dpyad// bsam gtan thob pa'i rgyu yin te// sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni// rnal 'byor thob par bya ba yin// sgra yi mtha' la gnas pa ni// bsam gtan thar pa ster bar byed// ngag gi sgra grag byed pa ni// bsam gtan gtso bor bshad pa yis// skabs 'dir g.yeng ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de la thugs kyi gsang ba ni// thugs kar sems dpa' rdo rje bsgom// ye shes sems dpa' bsgom pa ni// de ni thugs kyi mtshan ma la// de yi don ni byang chub sems// chos kyi sku ru gnas pa yis// mtshan ma rnam par bcad pa ni// thugs kyi bdag nyid de yin te// de ltar gsal ba gsum dmigs pa/ bsam gtan bya ba'i yul yin no// gsang ba gsum gyis thams cad bsdus// phyag rgya yongs su dag pa yi// lha rnams don dang rtags tshul bsdus// bsam gtan yan lag rnam pa lnga// rtog dpyod gnyis dang dga' bde gnyis// sems ni rtse gcig pa dang lnga// yan lag tshul gyis dmigs par byed// gsang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid la// ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'i blo// de la rtogs nas skye ba'o// de la spyod par byed pa ni// de nyid la ni blo nyid kyis// yang dang yang du sbyor bya zhing // de yi don dang bcas pa la// zhib tu dpyod pa yang nas yang // spyod par byed cing 'jug pa'o// de la dga' bar bya ba ni// rtog dpyod gnyis kyi bsam gtan las// thob pas gsang ba gsum po yi// 'dra snang rnam par 'byung gyur te// de'i tshe 'dod pas dben gyur pa// sngar ma myong ba'i don nyid ni// myong bas thun mong ma yin pa'i// dga' ba rlabs po cher skye'o// de la bde ba bya ba ni// de dbang sems bsdus thob pa na// lus dang sems kyi bde ba ni// des ni nyams su myong 'gyur ro// de la sems rtse gcig pa ni// de ltar sems kyis bsdus 'gyur las// shes pa dang ni shes bya yang // gnyis su snang bar mi skye ste// rang rig tsam du 'gyur ba'o// bsam gtan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de ltar bsam gtan dag gis ni// sems ni zhi bar bya ba la// shin tu dul bar bya ba'i phyir// dbugs kyang dgag cing gtang bar bya// bslab
text_b:
rtag du rang gi lha'i bdag nyid du bltas te spyad
par bya la dngos por zhen pa dang dgag pa gnyis spang bar bya ba 'di ni/ dbang po
rang bzhin gyis bsdams shing / 'dod pa bkag pa'i gdung bas kyang ma zin pa dang
/ rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyang nye bar 'gyur bas/ bsam gtan kyi snod du gyur pa yin
no/ /'di la so sor spyod pa ces kyang bya ste/ de bas longs spyod do/ /so sor spong ba
zhes kyang bya ste/ 'dod pas g.yeng bar 'gyur ba spong ngo / /bsam gtan ni 'dod pa
dang sdig to mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa las skyes pa yin pas/ de'i 'og du bsam gtanbstan par rigs so/ /de yang yan lag rnam pa lnga ste/ 'di ltar rtog dpyod gnyis/ dga'
bde gnyis/ sems rtse gcig pa dang lnga'o/ /bsam gtan gyi yul yang 'di'i skabs su gsang
ba gsum nyid yin te/ gsang ba gsum kyis ni phyag rgya thams cad bsdus so/ /phyag
rgyas ni yongs su dag pa'i lha thams cad kyang don dang rtags kyi tshul kyis bsdus
so/ /de la gsang ba gsum las/ sku'i gsang ba ni/ lha'i gzugs kyi sku kha dog dang
dbyibs dang g.yo ba'i bye brag /'di skad du/ smind ma mig dang so dang
mchu/ /bzhin dang lus dang rkang lag gis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya/ /rang don
las rnams sgrub byed pa'o/ /zhes gsungs pa bzhin/ sku'i tshul thams cad kyi sgo
nas/ bsam gtan kyi yul du dmigs pa'o/ /gsung gi gsang ba ni/ /sgra dang sgra min
rnam dpyad pa/ /bsam gtan phyi ma las/  nga ro sbas pa rdo rje'i gsung / /zhes bya
ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ltar/ lha'i thugs ka dang ljags stengs su chos kyi yi ge kha dog
dang dbyibs kyi mtshan mar bsam pa dang / de yang sgra dang sgra'i don kyi chos
nyid dang bcas par brtag cing dpyad pa ni bsam gtan thob pa'i rgyu yin te/ ji skad
du/ sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni rnal 'byor thob par byed pa yin la/ sgra'i mtha' la
gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni thar pa ster bar byed par gsungs pa dang 'dra'o/ /ngag sgra
grags par brjod pa ni bsam gtan gtsor smos pa'i skabs 'dir g.yeng ba'i rgyur 'gyur
ro/ /thugs kyi gsang ba ni/ thugs kar sems pa'i rdo rje bsgom pa dang / ye shes sems
dpa' lta bu bsgom pa ni thugs kyi mtshan ma/ de'i don byang chub kyi sems dang
chos kyi skur gnas pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par dpyad pa ni thugs kyi bdag nyid de/ de
ltar gsang ba gsum la dmigs pa ni bsam gtan gyi yul lo/ /de la dmigs par byed pa
ni/ yan lag lnga'i tshul gyis dmigs par byed de/ de la rtog pa ni gsang ba gsum gyi
mtshan nyid ji ltar ba bzhin du rtog pa'i blo skye ba'o/ /dpyod pa ni de nyid la blo
yang dang yang du sbyor zhing /  de'i don dang bcas pa la dpyod pa yang dang yang
'jug pa'o/ /dga' ba ni rtog dpyod gnyis kyi bsam gtan thob pas gsang ba gsum gyi 'dra
snang gi rnam pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe 'dod pas dben par gyur pa dang / sngar
ma myong ba'i don nyams su myong bas thun mong ma yin pa'i dga' ba rlabs po che
skye'o/ /bde ba ni de'i dbang gis sems bsdus pa thob pa na lus dang sems kyi tshor ba
bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /sems rtse gcig pa ni de ltar sems shin du bsdus
par gyur pa las/ shes pa dang shes bya gnyis su snang bar mi skye ste/ rang rig pa
tsam du gyur pa'o/ /de ltar bsam gtan kyis sems zhi bar byas pa la/ de shin du dul bar
bya ba'i phyir dbugs dgag cing gtang ba la bslab

text_a: s su rtag pa'am// rdzogs tshul gang yang rung bar bsgom// lha yi yon tan rnam gnyis tshogs// dus gcig rdzogs par gyur pa'o// de ltar dmigs pa rnam gsum la// rim gyis bslab cing rim gyis brten// 'di ni phyis pa dang po ru// zhugs pa tsam du dngos su ni// lus nyid sems kyi rnam pa yin// sems kyi rang bzhin lha nyid yin// de bas phyi nang snod bcud kyi// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang gi ngo bo lha nyid shes// dang po lha ngo shes pa yin// bar du lha bsgom thabs shes pa// sgrub thabs sna tshogs gsungs pa dang // bsam gtan lus dang sems don gyis// bcos pa'i thabs rnams bstan pa yin// tha ma las su rung ba'i tshad// mtshan ma med pa'i lha tshad ni// byang chub sems la lha ru bzhag/ mtshan ma lha yi sku bsgom tshad// lhang nge lhan nineni lham me gsum// lham me ba ni ma rdos pa// lhan ne ba ni ma g.yos pa// lhang nge ba ni ma bsgribs pa// ma rdos snang la rang bzhin med// gzugs brnyan chu zla lta bu'o// ma g.yos pa ni bying rgod kyi// zug rdu ma skyes pa yin te// nor bu rin chen 'od lta bu// ma bsgribs de gnyis dang ldan pas// ma rtogs pa yi sgrib pa dang // mi gsal ba yi sgrib pa gnyis// med par shin tu gsal bar snang // dbang pos blta bar mi bzod ltar// lha sku shin tu gsal ba'o// tshul bzhin byed par ma nus na// bzlas brjod lha yi de kho nas// lhar grags lhun grub sems can khengs// rang la gnas pa de rtogs yin// tshul bzhin slob bar 'dod pa yis// de dag rnams kyis tshul du spyod// gang dag tshul bzhin byed ma nus// mos dang bya bas g.yeng 'gyur zhing // tshul bzhin sbyor bar mi nus rnams// brda' don lha yi ting 'dzin ni// ji ltar yin pa yid la bya// des zin cho ga rim gyis bskyed// skad cig gcig la rdzogs tshul lam// bag chags shugs sam mos pa dang // nga rgyal dag gi sgo nas kyang // ma yengs pa yi sems kyis gzung // bzlas brjod bya zhing bsam gtan 'jug/ bzlas brjod byed pa'i tshe na yang // lha ni mi bsam ma dmigs rung // las sam 'bras bu gang dmigs kyang // spyir na dmigs pa rtse gcig la// 'bad pas mthu dang byin rlabs che// spyir na lha yi de kho na// nyid las 'grub pa'i lha yang 'grub// don dam sems kyi lha dang ni// kun rdzob mtshan ma'i lha nyid la// sems dpa' bye brag lha zhes bya// ming du lhar ni btags pa yin// dam tshig can gyi skye bo'i lha// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma lhar grags pa// btags pas rnam pa du mar 'jug/ rnam par smin pa'i lus dbyibs kyis/ bye brag dpe phyi zhes pa dang // de nyid bdag gi chen po'o// mtshan ma'i gzugs zhes btags pa dang // de nyid skye bo'i byin rlabs sogs// nus mthu can zhes btags pa dang // de nyid rnam par smin pa'i gzugs// bye brag ye shes byin brlabs nyid// dbyer med 'dres nas lha zhes btags// de nyid bdag nyid chen po rnam// thugs ni gsang ba'i ye shes nyid// mtshan ma'i gzugs su sprul pa ste// chu nyid grang ba'i rkyen gyis ni// 'khrugs rom gyur pa lta bu'o// chos rna
text_b:
s su brtags pa'am/ rdzogs pa'i tshul
gang yang rung bar bsgom mo/ /yon tan ni/  tshogs rnam pa gnyis dus gcig du
rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar dmigs pa rnam pa gsum la rims kyis bslab cing / rims
kyis bstan par bshad pa 'di ni/ byis pa dang po gzhug pa tsam ste/ dngos su ni lus
nyid sems kyi rnam pa yin la/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni lha yin no/ /de bas na phyi nang
snod bcud kyi chos thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo lha nyid du shes pa ni/ dang po lha
ngo shes pa yin no/ /bar du lha bsgom pa'i thabs shes pa ni/ bsgrub thabs sna tshogs
nas gsungs pa dang / gong du bstan pa'i bsam gtan kyi lung sems lon gyis bcos pa'i
thabs bstan pa rnams yin no/ /tha ma las su rung ba'i tshad bstan pa ni/ mtshan ma
med pa'i lha'i tshad ni gong du bstan zin to/ /mtshan ma'i lha'i sku bsgoms pa'i tshad
ni/ lha'i lung bcur bstan pa'ang yod na/ mdo gsum du 'dus te/ lham me/ lhan
ne/ lhang nge ba dang gsum ste/ de la lham me ni ma brdos pa/ lhan ne ni ma g.yos
pa/ lhang nge ni ma bsgribs pa'o/ /de la ma brdos pa ni snang la rang bzhin med pa
ste/ gzugs brnyan nam chu zla lta bu'o/ /ma g.yos pa ni bying rgod kyi zug rngus ma
bskyod pa ste/ nor bu rin po che'i 'od lta bu'o/ /ma bsgribs pa ni de gnyis dang ldan
pas ma rtogs pa'i sgrib pa dang / mi gsal ba'i sgrib pa gnyis med par shin du gsal bar
snang ba/ dbang pos blta bar mi bzod pa ltar shin tu gsal ba'o/ /de dag ni tshul bzhin
du slob par 'dod pa rnams kyi dbang du bshad pa'o/ /gang dag mos pa dang bya bas
g.yengs par gyur cing tshul bzhin du sbyor mi nus pa rnams kyis ni/ rdzogs pa chen
po'i don dang / lha'i rang bzhin ji ltar ba yid la bya ste/ des zin par byas la/ cho ga'i
rim pas bskyed kyang rung / skad cig gcig la rdzogs pa'i tshul lam/ bag chags kyi
shugs sam/ mos pa dang nga rgyal kyi sgo nas kyang ma yengs pa'i sems kyis bzung
ste/ bzlas brjod dang bsam gtan la 'jug go /bzlas brjod kyi tshe'ang mdun du lha
dmigs kyang rung / ma dmigs kyang rung / 'phro 'du yod kyang rung med kyang
rung / las sam 'bras bu gang la dmigs kyang rung ste/ spyir dmigs pa rtse gcig pas
'bad pa ltar mthu dang byin rlabs che'o/ /spyir lha'i de kho na nyid la/ lha drug du
grags pa dang / don dam pa'i lha chos nyid kyi lha/ dang / sems pa'i bye brag gi lha
gzhan kun/  zhes bya ba dang / lhar btags pa dang / dam tshig can gyi skye bos
brtags pa'i lha zhes spyir grags mod kyi/ phyag rgya'i mtshan ma la lhar grags pa
na/ brtag pa rnam pa du ma la 'jug ste/ rnam par pha rol du phyin pa'i lugs/  smin
pa'i lus kyi dbyibs kyi bye brag ces brtag pa dang / de nyid bdag nyid chen po sngags
kyi lugs/  rnams kyi mtshan ma'i gzugs so zhes brtag pa dang / de nyid skye bo byin
kyis rlob pa la sogs pa'i nus mthu can no zhes brtag pa dang / de nyid dam tshig can
kyi skye bos lhar brtags pa'o zhes brtag pa dang / de nyid rnam par smin pa'i gzugs
kyi bye brag dang / ye shes chen po'i byin rlabs gnyis dbyer med par 'dres pa'o zhes
brtag pa dang de nyid bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi thugs gsang ba'i ye shes nyidmtshan ma'i gzugs su sprul pa ste/ chu grang ba'i rkyen kyis chab rom du gyur pa lta
bu'o zhes brta

text_a: nas gsal// rnam pa'i 'od dang yi ge dang // mtshan ma dang ni phra mo'i sku// de lta bu yi rnam par dmigs// chos la ma brtan par dmigs la// bye brag so sor dbye ba med// dbugs ni phyi nang rgyu tsam dmigs// mtshan ma'i rnam pa gang yang rung // gcig la dmigs par bya ba'am// reg bya tsam la dmigs kyang rung // sems ma yengs par gtad pa ni// sems zin 'ba' zhig tsam gyis mtshon// spyi ru grags pa'i kha dog dang // bongs tshod skyon dang yon tan dang // khams rnams gdug pa'i mtshan nyid pas// brtan ni yul du dmigs pa tsam// mthu brtas dus ngan skyon yon yod// de la kha dog dkar po ni// gdug pa zhi byed mtshan nyid la// ser po gdug pa 'dzin pa'i mtshan// dmar po gdug pa mched mtshan nyid// nag po gdug pa'i slong ba'i mtshan// mtshan nyid de ltar byed pa'o// reg bya dang ni bongs tshod dang // sra zhing sbom pa ltar snang ba// lus la mi bde ba dag 'byung // phra zhing drangs pa chu zla ltar// rdos pa'i sha chung dmigs pa na// lus la mi bde mi 'byung ngongo// dbugs la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni// lus kyi rnam pa la mkhas pas// gcig phur blta dang dngos por blta// bden zhing gtsang mar blta rnams bzlog/ lhag mthong don yang bskyed pa'o// sems la gnas pa thob pas ni// zhig nas las su rung gyur pa// rang bzhin gnas yul lam dang las// dmigs pa'i thabs dang yon tan no// sems la dmigs pa'i rang bzhin ni// snang ba'i khams la dmigs pa dang // rlom sems pa yi khams dang ni// dngos po so sor rnam rig mkhas// sems kyi gnas ni sa chu me rlung mkha'i// khams lnga'i rlung la zhon nas su// khams lnga'i lus la gnas pa'o// sems kyi yul ni rnam rig pa// snang ba'i yul ni chos rnams la// rlom sems yul na sems nyid do// rnam par rig par bya ba'i yul// de ni phyi yi skye mched rnams// sems nyid lam ni dbang po rnams// sems kyi las gnyis 'dzin byed ni// 'dzin pa'i las kyis chos rnams 'dzin// byed pa'i las ni dkar nag gi/ 'du byed thams cad ma lus pa// mngon par 'du ni byed pa'o// sems la dmigs pa'i thabs dag ni// dbugs la dmigs pa la rung nas// de nas dran dang shes bzhin gzung // sems ni ji ltar bskyed nyid dmigs// sems kyi mtshan nyid khong chud
text_b:
nas dmigs pa'o/ /rnam pa'ang 'od dang yi ge dang mtshan ma dang sku phra
mo lta bu'i rnam par dmigs pa'o/ /chos la ma rten pa ni bye brag so sor phye ba med
par/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba tsam la dmigs te/ mtshan ma'i rnam pa gang yang
rung ba gcig la dmigs pa'am/ reg bya tsam la dmigs kyang rung ste/ sems ma yengs
par gtad pa 'ba' zhig tsam kyis kyang chog go /spyir grags pa'i kha dog dang bong
tshod kyi skyon dang yon tan ni/ khams rnams ni gdug pa'i mtshan nyid yin
pas/ bsam gtan gyi yul du dmigs pa tsam la'ang mthu brtags pa'i dus na/ skyon dang
yon tan yod de/ de la kha dog dkar po ni gdug pa zhi bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid/ ser
po ni gdug pa 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid/ dmar po ni gdug pa mched pa'i mtshan
nyid/ nag po ni gdug pa slong ba'i mtshan nyid zhes 'byung / reg bya dang bong
tshod kyang sra zhing sbom pa ltar lus la mi bde ba 'byung / phra zhing dang la chu
zla ltar dngos po'i shas chung bar dmigs na lus la mi bde ba mi 'byung ngo
zhe'o/ /dbugs la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni/ lus kyi rnam pa la mkhas pas gcig pur lta ba
dang / dngos por lta ba dang / bde zhing gtsang bar lta ba rnams ldog ste/ lhag
mthong bskyed do/ /sems gnas pa thob pas zhi gnas las su rung bar 'gyur ro/ /sems la
dmigs pa'ang de bzhin sbyar te/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni snang ba'i khams dang / rlom
sems pa'i khams dang / dngos po so so rnam par rig pa'i khams so/ /sems kyi gnas ni
khams lnga pa'i rlung la zhon nas khams lnga pa'i lus la gnas so/ /sems kyi yul
ni/ snang ba'i yul ni chos thams cad do/ /rlom sems pa'i yul ni sems nyid do/ /rnam
par rig pa'i yul ni phyi'i skye mched rnams so/ /sems kyi lam ni dbang po rnams
so/ /sems kyi las ni gnyis te/ 'dzin pa'i las ni chos thams cad 'dzin par byed do/ /byed
pa'i las ni dkar gnag gi 'du byed thams cad mngon par 'du byed do/ /sems la dmigs
pa'i thabs ni/ gong du dbugs la dmigs pa las su rung bas/ de nas dran pa dang shes
bzhin kyis bzung ste/ sems ji ltar skye ba nyid la dmigs pas sems kyi mtshan nyid
khong du chud

text_a: ng rgyu tsam dmigs// mtshan ma'i rnam pa gang yang rung // gcig la dmigs par bya ba'am// reg bya tsam la dmigs kyang rung // sems ma yengs par gtad pa ni// sems zin 'ba' zhig tsam gyis mtshon// spyi ru grags pa'i kha dog dang // bongs tshod skyon dang yon tan dang // khams rnams gdug pa'i mtshan nyid pas// brtan ni yul du dmigs pa tsam// mthu brtas dus ngan skyon yon yod// de la kha dog dkar po ni// gdug pa zhi byed mtshan nyid la// ser po gdug pa 'dzin pa'i mtshan// dmar po gdug pa mched mtshan nyid// nag po gdug pa'i slong ba'i mtshan// mtshan nyid de ltar byed pa'o// reg bya dang ni bongs tshod dang // sra zhing sbom pa ltar snang ba// lus la mi bde ba dag 'byung // phra zhing drangs pa chu zla ltar// rdos pa'i sha chung dmigs pa na// lus la mi bde mi 'byung ngongo// dbugs la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni// lus kyi rnam pa la mkhas pas// gcig phur blta dang dngos por blta// bden zhing gtsang mar blta rnams bzlog/ lhag mthong don yang bskyed pa'o// sems la gnas pa thob pas ni// zhig nas las su rung gyur pa// rang bzhin gnas yul lam dang las// dmigs pa'i thabs dang yon tan no// sems la dmigs pa'i rang bzhin ni// snang ba'i khams la dmigs pa dang // rlom sems pa yi khams dang ni// dngos po so sor rnam rig mkhas// sems kyi gnas ni sa chu me rlung mkha'i// khams lnga'i rlung la zhon nas su// khams lnga'i lus la gnas pa'o// sems kyi yul ni rnam rig pa// snang ba'i yul ni chos rnams la// rlom sems yul na sems nyid do// rnam par rig par bya ba'i yul// de ni phyi yi skye mched rnams// sems nyid lam ni dbang po rnams// sems kyi las gnyis 'dzin byed ni// 'dzin pa'i las kyis chos rnams 'dzin// byed pa'i las ni dkar nag gi/ 'du byed thams cad ma lus pa// mngon par 'du ni byed pa'o// sems la dmigs pa'i thabs dag ni// dbugs la dmigs pa la rung nas// de nas dran dang shes bzhin gzung // sems ni ji ltar bskyed nyid dmigs// sems kyi mtshan nyid khong chud 'gyur// sems la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni// bdag tu blta dang rtags par blta/ dngos por blta ba thams cad bzlog/ lhag mthong bskyed
text_b:
ng du rgyu ba tsam la dmigs te/ mtshan ma'i rnam pa gang yang
rung ba gcig la dmigs pa'am/ reg bya tsam la dmigs kyang rung ste/ sems ma yengs
par gtad pa 'ba' zhig tsam kyis kyang chog go /spyir grags pa'i kha dog dang bong
tshod kyi skyon dang yon tan ni/ khams rnams ni gdug pa'i mtshan nyid yin
pas/ bsam gtan gyi yul du dmigs pa tsam la'ang mthu brtags pa'i dus na/ skyon dang
yon tan yod de/ de la kha dog dkar po ni gdug pa zhi bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid/ ser
po ni gdug pa 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid/ dmar po ni gdug pa mched pa'i mtshan
nyid/ nag po ni gdug pa slong ba'i mtshan nyid zhes 'byung / reg bya dang bong
tshod kyang sra zhing sbom pa ltar lus la mi bde ba 'byung / phra zhing dang la chu
zla ltar dngos po'i shas chung bar dmigs na lus la mi bde ba mi 'byung ngo
zhe'o/ /dbugs la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni/ lus kyi rnam pa la mkhas pas gcig pur lta ba
dang / dngos por lta ba dang / bde zhing gtsang bar lta ba rnams ldog ste/ lhag
mthong bskyed do/ /sems gnas pa thob pas zhi gnas las su rung bar 'gyur ro/ /sems la
dmigs pa'ang de bzhin sbyar te/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni snang ba'i khams dang / rlom
sems pa'i khams dang / dngos po so so rnam par rig pa'i khams so/ /sems kyi gnas ni
khams lnga pa'i rlung la zhon nas khams lnga pa'i lus la gnas so/ /sems kyi yul
ni/ snang ba'i yul ni chos thams cad do/ /rlom sems pa'i yul ni sems nyid do/ /rnam
par rig pa'i yul ni phyi'i skye mched rnams so/ /sems kyi lam ni dbang po rnams
so/ /sems kyi las ni gnyis te/ 'dzin pa'i las ni chos thams cad 'dzin par byed do/ /byed
pa'i las ni dkar gnag gi 'du byed thams cad mngon par 'du byed do/ /sems la dmigs
pa'i thabs ni/ gong du dbugs la dmigs pa las su rung bas/ de nas dran pa dang shes
bzhin kyis bzung ste/ sems ji ltar skye ba nyid la dmigs pas sems kyi mtshan nyid
khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /dmigs pa'i yon tan ni/ bdag du lta ba dang / rtag par lta
ba dang / dngos por lta ba thams cad ldog ste/ lhag mthong skyed

text_a: chos rnams la// rlom sems yul na sems nyid do// rnam par rig par bya ba'i yul// de ni phyi yi skye mched rnams// sems nyid lam ni dbang po rnams// sems kyi las gnyis 'dzin byed ni// 'dzin pa'i las kyis chos rnams 'dzin// byed pa'i las ni dkar nag gi/ 'du byed thams cad ma lus pa// mngon par 'du ni byed pa'o// sems la dmigs pa'i thabs dag ni// dbugs la dmigs pa la rung nas// de nas dran dang shes bzhin gzung // sems ni ji ltar bskyed nyid dmigs// sems kyi mtshan nyid khong chud 'gyur// sems la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni// bdag tu blta dang rtags par blta/ dngos por blta ba thams cad bzlog/ lhag mthong bskyed par byed pa'o// sems nyid las su rung 'gyur te// de yis zhi gnas thob pa'o// lus sems dmigs pa las rung nas// lha dang dmigs par byed pa ni// rang bzhin gnas yul lam dang bcas// dmigs thabs yon tan rim pa dang // dang por bar tha sgom tshad mod// de la lha yi rang bzhin ni// chos nyid rnam par dag pa dang // rnam par mi rtog ye shes dang // cir yang sa le mkhyen pa yis// ye shes 'gro 'dul gzugs kyi sku// so so'i skad du dam pa'i chos// ston pa'i gsung de chos rnga yin// lha yi gnas ni sems can gyis// lus dang sems la gnas pa nyid// lha yi yul ni chos kyi dbyings// thugs rje'i zhing rnams gnas pa'o// lha yi lam ni gang yin pa// 'gro dang 'ong ba mi mnga' yang // lha yongs bzung ba'i sems can ni// sems can skyabs ni lha yin te// 'brel gnyis sgo nas lam gyur pa// lam gyi chos dang lung gi chos// lha yi lam du gyur pa'o// lha yi las ni 'dzin par byed// 'dzin pa'i las ni yon tan ni// thams cad kun dang ldan pa'o// byed pa'i las ni sems can rnams// thams cad grol bar mdzad pa'o// lha la dmigs par byed pa'i thabs// lus dang sems nyid ltar bsgom pas// de la rnal 'byor rnam gsum gyi// tshul gyis byin gyis brlab tshul lam// de nyid yongs su rtag pa'am// rdzogs tshul gang yang rung bar bsgom// lha yi yon tan rnam gnyis tshogs// dus gcig rdzogs par gyur pa'o// de ltar dmigs pa rnam gsum la// rim gyis bslab cing rim gyis brten// 'di ni phyis pa dang po ru// zhugs pa tsam du dngos su ni// lus nyid sems kyi rnam pa yin// sems kyi rang bzhin
text_b:
chos thams cad do/ /rlom sems pa'i yul ni sems nyid do/ /rnam
par rig pa'i yul ni phyi'i skye mched rnams so/ /sems kyi lam ni dbang po rnams
so/ /sems kyi las ni gnyis te/ 'dzin pa'i las ni chos thams cad 'dzin par byed do/ /byed
pa'i las ni dkar gnag gi 'du byed thams cad mngon par 'du byed do/ /sems la dmigs
pa'i thabs ni/ gong du dbugs la dmigs pa las su rung bas/ de nas dran pa dang shes
bzhin kyis bzung ste/ sems ji ltar skye ba nyid la dmigs pas sems kyi mtshan nyid
khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /dmigs pa'i yon tan ni/ bdag du lta ba dang / rtag par lta
ba dang / dngos por lta ba thams cad ldog ste/ lhag mthong skyed do/ /sems las su
rung bar 'gyur te zhi gnas 'thob bo/ /de ltar lus dang sems la dmigs pa las su rung
nas/ lha la dmigs par bya ste/ lha la'ang re zhig gi mtshan ma lus sems dang mthun
par bstan te/ de yang 'di ltar lha'i rang bzhin ni/ chos nyid dag pa dang / rnam par mi
rtog pa'i ye shes dang / ci yang sa le mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i
gzugs kyi sku dang / so so'i skad du dam pa'i chos ston pa'i gsung ste/ chos lnga'i
rang bzhin no/ /lha'i gnas ni/ sems can kyi lus dang sems nyid do/ /lha'i yul ni chos
kyi dbyings dang / thugs rje'i zhing rnams so/ /lha'i lam ni 'gro 'ong mi mnga' 'ang
/ lha'i yongs su gzung ba ni sems can/ sems can kyi skyabs ni lha ste/ 'brel pa gnyis
kyi sgo dang lam du gyur pa ni/ lam gyi chos sems can dang lhar 'brel/  dang lung gi
chos lha dang sems can du 'brel/  so/ /lha'i las ni/ 'dzin pa'i las ni yon tan thams caddang ldan pa'o/ /byed pa'i las ni sems can sgrol bar mdzad pa'o/ /lha la dmigs pa'i
thabs ni lus dang sems nyid lhar bsgoms pa ste/ de yang rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum gyi
tshul kyis/ byin kyis rlob pa'i tshul lam/ yongs su brtags pa'am/ rdzogs pa'i tshul
gang yang rung bar bsgom mo/ /yon tan ni/  tshogs rnam pa gnyis dus gcig du
rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar dmigs pa rnam pa gsum la rims kyis bslab cing / rims
kyis bstan par bshad pa 'di ni/ byis pa dang po gzhug pa tsam ste/ dngos su ni lus
nyid sems kyi rnam pa yin la/ sems kyi rang bzhin

text_a: ams lnga'i rlung la zhon nas su// khams lnga'i lus la gnas pa'o// sems kyi yul ni rnam rig pa// snang ba'i yul ni chos rnams la// rlom sems yul na sems nyid do// rnam par rig par bya ba'i yul// de ni phyi yi skye mched rnams// sems nyid lam ni dbang po rnams// sems kyi las gnyis 'dzin byed ni// 'dzin pa'i las kyis chos rnams 'dzin// byed pa'i las ni dkar nag gi/ 'du byed thams cad ma lus pa// mngon par 'du ni byed pa'o// sems la dmigs pa'i thabs dag ni// dbugs la dmigs pa la rung nas// de nas dran dang shes bzhin gzung // sems ni ji ltar bskyed nyid dmigs// sems kyi mtshan nyid khong chud 'gyur// sems la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni// bdag tu blta dang rtags par blta/ dngos por blta ba thams cad bzlog/ lhag mthong bskyed par byed pa'o// sems nyid las su rung 'gyur te// de yis zhi gnas thob pa'o// lus sems dmigs pa las rung nas// lha dang dmigs par byed pa ni// rang bzhin gnas yul lam dang bcas// dmigs thabs yon tan rim pa dang // dang por bar tha sgom tshad mod// de la lha yi rang bzhin ni// chos nyid rnam par dag pa dang // rnam par mi rtog ye shes dang // cir yang sa le mkhyen pa yis// ye shes 'gro 'dul gzugs kyi sku// so so'i skad du dam pa'i chos// ston pa'i gsung de chos rnga yin// lha yi gnas ni sems can gyis// lus dang sems la gnas pa nyid// lha yi yul ni chos kyi dbyings// thugs rje'i zhing rnams gnas pa'o// lha yi lam ni gang yin pa// 'gro dang 'ong ba mi mnga' yang // lha yongs bzung ba'i sems can ni// sems can skyabs ni lha yin te// 'brel gnyis sgo nas lam gyur pa// lam gyi chos dang lung gi chos// lha yi lam du gyur pa'o// lha yi las ni 'dzin par byed// 'dzin pa'i las ni yon tan ni// thams cad kun dang ldan pa'o// byed pa'i las ni sems can rnams// thams cad grol bar mdzad pa'o// lha la dmigs par byed pa'i thabs// lus dang sems nyid ltar bsgom pas// de la rnal 'byor rnam gsum gyi// tshul gyis byin gyis brlab tshul lam// de nyid yongs su rtag pa'am// rdzogs tshul gang yang rung bar bsgom// lha yi yon tan rnam gnyis tshogs// dus gcig rdzogs par gyur pa'o// de ltar dmigs pa rnam gsum la// rim gyis bslab cing rim gyis brten
